content: #20988 splits MultispanIndex into two structures which allow to make a distinction between the shape of a multiequalizer diagram and the diagram itself. It has had a few merge conflicts already. This shall be an important PR in the development of the homotopy theory of simplicial sets, as with the following PRs #21026, #21032, #21090 (and a few more), it will allow the gluing of morphisms in order to construct morphisms from the horns of the standard simplex.
